collection-9-description:
This collection features NFTs that provide access to useful options and additional opportunities within the Profit on Weed system.

NFTs from this collection are not sold and do not generate passive income.
condition-1: The amount must be a number
modalPayment.desc: Buying an NFT is an opportunity to acquire a unique digital asset that will not only be a valuable item in your collection, but will also help you make a profit.

modalSuccess.subtitle: Congratulations on purchasing NFT from the Profit on Weed project!
modalSuccess.text-1: Now you own a reliable, liquid and highly profitable investment instrument. You can find all your NFTs in your personal account in the My Farm section.
modalSuccess.text-2: Thank you for choosing to support Profit on Weed and being part of the team.
modalSuccess.text-3: Every day we work to ensure that you are satisfied with the results of cooperation.
modalSuccess.text-4: Watch the price of your NFT rise daily along with the growth of cannabis bushes and earn crop income with us!
modalSuccess.title: Dear partner!

step-1: At this stage, we will ask you to confirm the transaction for {{amount}} USDT (ERC20).
step-2: At this point, you need to confirm the transaction in order to create the NFT. After confirming the transaction, you will receive NFT to your wallet.
step-3: We confirm your transaction to activate the NFT. If you do not receive a successful notification, the system will automatically activate your NFT within 20 minutes.
timer-sales-ends: Remaining until the end of the promotion:
title: Store
warning: Please do not leave the page until your transaction is confirmed on the blockchain. Otherwise, your NFT will not be activated. The completion of each step depends on the confirmation of the transaction on the blockchain. Also pay attention to the network load and commission.
what-is-reinvest: Reinvestment is the reinsertion of received income.
